title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Gas Leak Explosion
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: An Instagram influencer lighting a cigarette in a hostel kitchen ignites accumulated gas from an undetected leak, turning her viral moment into a literal firestorm.

death_teaser: Her followers always said she was on fire. They weren't supposed to be right.
